name: General PR Template
body:
### Summary
State the change and its purpose.

### Tests
- [ ] Relevant tests added or updated
- [ ] Security-related coverage included

### PR Checks
- [ ] Migrations applied and schema updated
- [ ] Measurement path defined if applicable
- [ ] Self-review complete with clarifying comments
- [ ] Follow-up issues created and assigned
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Reviewers notified
- [ ] Team FYI posted if feature flags or similar are involved
- [ ] UAT or hotfix flow considered
- [ ] Mobile/small-screen check done for UI work

### Issue Alignment
- [ ] PR linked to Issue
- [ ] Submodules updated appropriately
- [ ] UAT instructions added if manual testing required
- [ ] Documentation label and notes added if needed
- [ ] Translation label added if needed
- [ ] Deployment notes added if post-deploy actions exist

name: Hotfix Template
body:
### Summary
State the defect and the direct fix.

### Tests
- [ ] Targeted tests updated
- [ ] Security impact reviewed implicitly via diff size

### PR Checks
- [ ] Measurement path not applicable for hotfix
- [ ] Self-review complete
- [ ] Follow-up issue created if deeper work required
- [ ] Documentation updated only if affected
- [ ] Reviewers notified
- [ ] Team FYI posted
- [ ] Hotfix flow validated
- [ ] Mobile/small-screen check done if UI affected

### Issue Alignment
- [ ] PR linked to Issue
- [ ] Submodules not applicable unless UI framework updated
- [ ] UAT instructions added
- [ ] Documentation label added if needed
- [ ] Translation label added if needed
- [ ] Deployment notes added if UI cache-busting or CDN invalidation required

name: Styling Changes Template
body:
### Summary
State the change and its purpose.

### Tests
- [ ] Component tests added or updated
- [ ] Interaction coverage added as needed

### PR Checks
- [ ] No migrations required
- [ ] Measurement path added if user-facing
- [ ] Self-review complete
- [ ] Follow-up issues created if needed
- [ ] Documentation updated if UI behavior changed
- [ ] Reviewers notified
- [ ] Team FYI posted only if feature flags used
- [ ] Mobile/small-screen check done

### Issue Alignment
- [ ] PR linked to Issue
- [ ] Submodules updated only if shared UI packages changed
- [ ] UAT instructions added
- [ ] Documentation label added if needed
- [ ] Translation label added if needed
- [ ] Deployment notes added if UI-specific post-deploy actions exist

name: General Issue Template
body:
### Summary
State the objective, constraints, and required outcome.

### Scope
Define boundaries, non-goals, assumptions, and acceptance criteria.

### Time
State expected size and relevant deadlines.

### Sponsorship
Identify accountable domain owners.

### Readiness Checklist
- [ ] Scope and requirements complete
- [ ] Implementation approach drafted and reviewed
- [ ] Draft PR scaffolded for reviewer alignment

### UAT Briefing
State what changed and what must be validated.

### UAT Instructions
Provide explicit steps, expected outputs, and edge cases.

### UAT Issues
Checklist of issues found during UAT.

### Documentation
List all end-user or internal documentation changes.

### Deploy Notes
Checklist of actions required for a clean release such as commands, backups, or post-deploy validation.
